types.html:
vol coqueluche m (plural vols coqueluche)

  1. (alternative medicine) a European climatotherapy for whooping cough, that involves a flight consisting of a rapid ascent to 3—3.5km up, staying there for 3/4—1 hour, descent to 1.5km and then landing
trans: a European climatotherapy for whooping cough, that involves a flight consisting of a rapid ascent to 3—3.5km up, staying there for 3/4—1 hour, descent to 1.5km and then landing
